subject: Allow non-UUID email IDs in LocalInboxCache (safe mapping)
description: Current LocalInboxCache enforces /^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$/ for emailId, but S3/Message-ID values often include dots, plus, @, or angle brackets. Replace hard rejection with a safe mapping (e.g., base64url/hash) for filenames while preserving original ID in index. Add tests for IDs containing '.', '+', '@', and '<>'.
